text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS Not by going back to work as if nothing happened. Not by being "warriors" for America, dying so that you can be re-elected.  Not by shutting down the coronavirus task force and pretending that the crisis is over.  Not by asking Americans to risk their lives for the stock market.
